item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: Azure Site Recovery support for Ultra Disks
item.description:
Azure Site Recovery is now generally available for Virtual Machines using Ultra Disks, enabling cross-region replication, failover, and failback to improve disaster recovery for highâ€‘performance workloads with minimal impact.

  • Source: Azure Updates
